name: CLAUDIX29's World
description:
CLAUDIX29's World
it's a platform game,kill monsters, parkour and pass all levels!
INSTRUCTION:
Mobile: use the arrows to move and jump,use use the enter button to enter the portals
Computer: use W-A-S-D to move and jump,use the space bar to enter the portals
Mobs: if the monster hits you it kills you,but if you jump on his head you kill the monster
